head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SMITH, MARY THORNTON

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SMITH, MARY THORNTON

block.p: SMITH-Mary Thornton, 93, June 3 at home. At The Brearley School in NYC she acted as secretary and assistant to the head of the lower school for 48 years. She took an active interest in protecting the environment through many conservation organizations and was an advocate for endangered species. She is survived by a large family and devoted friends.
